# Setup

## Data Import

Reading in 'iris' data exported from `generate.Rmd`.

```{r}
iris = read.csv("output/iris.csv")
```

## PCA Parameters

Using an analysis configuration file to set parameters.

```{r}
ana_species = readLines("code/analysis_config.txt")
```

```{r}
# remove the first column
iris = iris[, -1]

# leave only the species to be analysed
iris = iris[iris$Species %in% ana_species, ]
```

# PCA

```{r}
# calculate principal compomnents for 'iris' dataset
iris_pca = prcomp(iris[, c(1,2,3,4)])
# save the first two PCs, along with the species names
iris_pca = data.frame(iris_pca$x[, c(1, 2)])
iris_pca = cbind(iris_pca, data.frame(Species=iris$Species))
# write to 'output/iris_pca.csv'
write.csv(iris_pca, file="output/iris_pca.csv")
```

## Generated data

data.frame of the generated data (first 10 rows)

```{r, echo = TRUE, include = TRUE}
print(iris_pca[1:10, ])
```
